scripts.checks: npm run build:sync-assets && yarn run lint && yarn run build
scripts.checks:docker: npm run build:docker-sync-assets && npm run lint:docker && npm run build:docker
scripts.start:docker: docker run --platform=$(docker system info --format '{{.OSType}}/{{.Architecture}}') --rm --tty --interactive --workdir=/app/apps/sample-explorer --publish=3000:3000 portal-react-apps/sample-explorer:latest-builder-base yarn run start
scripts.start:docker-prod: docker run --platform=$(docker system info --format '{{.OSType}}/{{.Architecture}}') --rm --tty --interactive --volume=/$(pwd)/build:/app/apps/sample-explorer/build --workdir=/app/apps/sample-explorer --publish=3000:3000 portal-react-apps/sample-explorer:latest-builder-base yarn run start:prod
scripts.build:docker: docker run --platform=$(docker system info --format '{{.OSType}}/{{.Architecture}}') --rm --tty --interactive --volume=/$(pwd)/build:/app/apps/sample-explorer/build --workdir=/app/apps/sample-explorer portal-react-apps/sample-explorer:latest-builder-base yarn run build
scripts.lint:docker: docker run --platform=$(docker system info --format '{{.OSType}}/{{.Architecture}}') --rm --tty --interactive --workdir=/app/apps/sample-explorer portal-react-apps/sample-explorer:latest-builder-base yarn run lint
scripts.build:docker-sync-assets: docker run --platform=$(docker system info --format '{{.OSType}}/{{.Architecture}}') --rm --tty --interactive --volume=/$(pwd)/public:/app/apps/sample-explorer/public --workdir=/app/apps/sample-explorer portal-react-apps/sample-explorer:latest-builder-base npm run build:sync-assets
